en-US.awayModeMessageAssigned: It appears that some time has passed without a response from either party, but you are still connected to our in-store stylist. To continue the conversation, reply to this automated message or wait for the stylist’s reply. If you’d rather not wait, click the menu to provide your SMS number and we will get back to you shortly.
